name: Alvora Tactics
description: Alvora Tactics is an indie Tactics RPG that combines strategic combat with immersive exploration. Explore and conquer Great Serpent Alvora with your own customizable band of warriors!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Must support Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1000 MB available space
